remarks.format: ## Remarks 双击重叠控件将在重叠的每个书签上引发事件。Double-clicking overlapping controls raises the event on each of the bookmarks that overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将包含文本的控件添加到文档中, 然后创建一个事件处理程序。The following code example adds a control with the text to the document and then creates a event handler. 双击控件时, 将选择书签中的文本。The text within the bookmark is selected when the control is double-clicked. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 该数字对应于文档中的控件顺序:1表示第一个书签, 2 表示第二个书签, 依此类推。The number corresponds to the order of the control in the document: 1 for the first bookmark, 2 for the second one, and so on. 如果删除其中一个书签, 则其他书签的将相应地进行重新编号。If one of the bookmarks is deleted, then the of the other bookmarks will renumber accordingly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件添加到文档, 然后通过在消息框中显示书签, 在文档中显示书签的位置。The following code example adds a control to the document and then displays the position of the bookmark in the document by showing the in a message box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 将 控件折叠到起始或结束位置。

span.span: Collapses a control to the starting or ending position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件折叠后, 开始点和结束点相等。After a control is collapsed, the starting and ending points are equal. 如果使用 折叠引用整个段落的控件, 则该范围位于结束段落标记 (下一段落的开头) 之后。If you use to collapse a control that refers to an entire paragraph, the range is located after the ending paragraph mark (the beginning of the next paragraph). 不过, 您可以在 控件范围折叠后使用方法将范围移回一个字符。However, you can move the range back one character by using the method after the range of the control is collapsed. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用文本添加一个控件, 然后在折叠书签之前和之后显示书签的起始位置和结束位置。The following code example adds a control with text, and then displays the start and end position of the bookmark before and after collapsing the bookmark. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 避免在应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications. 如果过程中需要密码, 请从用户请求密码, 将其存储在变量中, 然后在代码中使用该变量。If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code. 避免使用内置系统管理员 (sa) 登录帐户。Avoid using the built-in system administrator (sa) logon account. 相反, 使系统管理员成为 sysadmin 固定服务器角色的成员, 并让他们使用自己的帐户进行登录。Instead, make system administrators members of the sysadmin fixed server role, and have them use their own accounts to log on. 仅当没有其他方法登录时才使用 sa。Use sa only when there is no other way to log on. 若要防止通过 sa 登录帐户进行未经授权的访问, 应为该帐户分配一个强的唯一密码。To prevent unauthorized access through the sa logon account, you should assign that account a strong, unique password. 如果可能, 请使用 Windows 身份验证 (也称为可信连接), 该身份验证使用 Windows 用户帐户连接到 SQL Server。When possible, use Windows Authentication (also referred to as a trusted connection), which uses a Windows user account to connect to SQL Server. 当用户通过 Windows 用户帐户连接时, SQL Server 将使用 Windows 操作系统中的信息来验证帐户名和密码。When a user connects through a Windows user account, SQL Server uses information in the Windows operating system to validate the account name and password. 在您可以使用 Windows 身份验证之前, 服务器管理员必须将 SQL Server 配置为使用此模式的身份验证。Before you can use Windows Authentication, a server administrator must configure SQL Server to use this mode of authentication. 如果 Windows 身份验证不可用, 请避免保存用户的登录信息。If Windows Authentication is not available, avoid saving users' logon information. 用户在每次登录时都输入其登录信息更安全。It is more secure for users to enter their logon information each time they log on. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 此示例将一个 Microsoft Excel 电子表格插入到控件中。This example inserts a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet into the control. 样式值 (191) 是数字1、2、4、8、16、32和128的组合。The Style value (191) is a combination of the numbers 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, and 128. 此示例假设有一个名`Data.xlsx`为的工作簿保存到 C 目录的根目录中, 工作表上至少有两行数据。This example assumes you have a workbook named `Data.xlsx` saved to the root of the C directory with at least two rows of data on the worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization.
